channel.title: Libvirtd errors
channel.description:
After running virt-manager, these errors appear in the libvirtd log:
> libvirtd [5452]: operation error: the default pool already exists (UUID: 5e17cb30-a5fa-474c-b1e2-356682ffd505) > libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files > libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files > libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files
And after starting the virtual machine, these errors come out:
> libvirtd [5452]: Domain id = 1 name = 'Whonix-Gateway' uuid = d6d689fa-2499-4ce2-ab8f-56c81ece9cb8 is tainted: host-cpu > libvirtd [5452]: Domain id = 2 name = 'Whonix-Workstation' uuid = 90fbed2e-a1dd-41c0-a810-40db5200680d is tainted: host-cpu
Actually, I don’t see any problems with virtual machines, but these errors scare me. Are they significant?

item.title: Libvirtd errors
item.dc:creator: kelman
item.description:
Nice, thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Libvirtd errors
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
kelman:

Actually, I don’t see any problems with virtual machines, but these errors scare me. Are they significant?

No, you’re OK.

Read full topic

item.title: Libvirtd errors
item.dc:creator: kelman
item.description:
After running virt-manager, these errors appear in the libvirtd log:

libvirtd [5452]: operation error: the default pool already exists (UUID: 5e17cb30-a5fa-474c-b1e2-356682ffd505)
libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files
libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files
libvirtd [5452]: internal error: could not determine the number of host interfaces: unspecified error - errors in loading some config files

And after starting the virtual machine, these errors come out:

libvirtd [5452]: Domain id = 1 name = ‘Whonix-Gateway’ uuid = d6d689fa-2499-4ce2-ab8f-56c81ece9cb8 is tainted: host-cpu
libvirtd [5452]: Domain id = 2 name = ‘Whonix-Workstation’ uuid = 90fbed2e-a1dd-41c0-a810-40db5200680d is tainted: host-cpu

Actually, I don’t see any problems with virtual machines, but these errors scare me. Are they significant?
